name: Daqo New Energy Corp.
description: Daqo New Energy Corp. is a leading manufacturer and supplier of high-quality polysilicon for the solar photovoltaic (PV) industry. Founded in 2007 and headquartered in Shanghai, China, the company specializes in the production of polysilicon, a key component used in the manufacturing of solar cells and modules. Daqo operates a state-of-the-art production facility in Xinjiang, which employs advanced technologies and processes to ensure high purity levels and efficiency in polysilicon production. With a strong commitment to sustainability and innovation, Daqo plays a crucial role in supporting the global transition to renewable energy sources. The company continuously invests in research and development to enhance its production capabilities and reduce environmental impacts, aligning with the increasing global demand for clean energy solutions. As the demand for solar energy continues to rise, Daqo New Energy is well-positioned to capitalize on growth opportunities within the renewable energy sector, contributing to a sustainable future.
